Description: On I-81 at mile marker 146 in the County of Roanoke, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. The north right lane and right shoulder are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 111.3 in the County of Caroline, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The south right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 174 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The north entrance ramp is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 53.5 in the City of Colonial Heights, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. The north center lane, right lane, and right shoulder are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash
